template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a {business_type} that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a managed hosting provider that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Create an automated workflow that triages hosting tickets, solves common issues automatically, escalates complex cases to human agents, and tracks resolution performance.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise prompt under 40 words describing a multi-step customer support automation workflow for a managed hosting provider. The workflow needs to include triage, auto-resolution for simple issues, escalation for complex cases, and performance tracking. 

I can structure it as a clear instruction for an AI or system designer. Starting with the main action ("Create an automated workflow..."), then listing the key components in a logical sequence: triage first, then auto-resolution and escalation as parallel paths, ending with performance tracking. 

Need to keep it under 40 words while covering all required elements. The current draft hits 32 words - "Create an automated workflow that triages hosting tickets, solves common issues automatically, escalates complex cases to human agents, and tracks resolution performance." That covers all four components in a natural flow.
